reviews.text: We had visited the hotel a couple of times in the past and were very pleased by the service, that is why we decided our first visit outside of our home with the 5 months old daughter to be here.
reviews.title: Not what it used to be anymore

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This last visit was a disappointment. Room was not ready to accept us, they have changed for one that was very noisy and my little daughter was woken-up a couple of times by door slams in the corridor. We complained and they have changed the room, which was next to the maintenance room, where people were moving furniture and shouting whole evening.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.text: Restaurant is a total disaster, two consecutive nights of really bad food (undercooked meat from the bbq; deeply frozen fish), which brought some stomach disorder even to myself (proven to have a strong stomach). The service is as low as in a motel (more than 20 minutes to get the check), but the pricing is according to the 4 * expectations (and 30% higher than during the last visit).
reviews.title: Very beautifull hotel

reviews.text: Also, hotel was constantly full with team-building groups, which also ruined expected spa-treated calm rest in an expensive location (fireworks @ 10p.m. in an 4* SPA location?!?).
reviews.title: excellent hotel

reviews.text: The only thing that was at the same level as before was spa center - nice and wide choice of massages and treatments, good quality of the service as well.
reviews.title: Loved thepa center and the rooms
